column4: I've problem with sound and ACPI o Acer Aspire 3650 (Intel Celeron, ATI200 chipset). Laptop sounds, but i can't setup volume, microphone is off. ACPI doesn't send informations to programs which a don't wanna run on battery and when i close display, laptop doesn't susspend.
sorry for my terrible english, it's not my natural language
dapper or edgy? Regarding sound, did you double-click (not single-click) on the speaker icon and play with the sliders for playback and capture?
Dappr
after clicking on speaker icon i see mixer, bat no sliders are there :-(
Sorry Edgy, Xubuntu
run alsamixer from the terminal and see if you get better results.
you might also try the #xubuntu channel because I don't know anything about the icons you will see for xfce.
System is same, change is only in desktop
alsamixer says: alsamixer: function snd_mixer_load failed: Invalid argument
On desktop all works fine... :'(
you are starting to have something to google. Do you know the soundcard chipset?
Audio device: ATI Technologies Inc Unknown device 437b (rev 01)
what does "lspci | grep audio" give you from the terminal?
nothing...
00:14.2 Audio device: ATI Technologies Inc Unknown device 437b (rev 01)
lsmod | grep snd
I would try to find from Google exactly what chipset is in your sound card, then do some google searches for that chipset with "alsa" or "dapper" and find out how other people solved this.
i've tried, but no success...
so what is the chipset?
ATI200x
cheap laptop :-(
isn't that the chipset of the mainboard but not of the sound card specifically?
Yes, but its all in one, i don't know, howto get identifier of soundcard only. lspci says: 00:14.2 Audio device: ATI Technologies Inc Unknown device 437b (rev 01)
